title: SARIF External Property File Schema Version 2.0.0-csd.2.beta.2019-04-03 JSON Schema

schema.description: The URI of the JSON schema corresponding to the version of the external property file format.

version.description: The SARIF format version of this external properties object.

guid.description: A stable, unique identifer for this external properties object, in the form of a GUID.

runGuid.description: A stable, unique identifer for the run associated with this external properties object, in the form of a GUID.

conversion.description: A conversion object that will be merged with an external run.

graphs.description: An array of graph objects the will merged with an external run.

externalizedProperties.description: Key/value pairs that provide additional information that will be merged with an external run.

artifacts.description: An array of artifact objects that will be merged with an external run.

invocations.description: Describes the invocation of the analysis tool that will be merged with an external run.

logicalLocations.description: An array of logical locations such as namespaces, types or functions that will be merged with an external run.

threadFlowLocations.description: An array of threadFlowLocation objects that will be merged with an external run.

results.description: An array of result objects that will be merged with an external run.

taxonomies.description: An array of reportingDescriptor objects that will be merged with an external run.

driver.description: The analysis tool object that will be merged with an external run.

extensions.description: Tool extensions that will be merged with an external run.

properties.description: Key/value pairs that provide additional information about the external properties.
